scripts.build: rollup src/lumiere.js --format cjs --output dist/lumiere.js; rollup src/lumiere.js --format umd --output dist/lumiere.umd.js -n lumiere; uglifyjs dist/lumiere.umd.js -o dist/lumiere.min.js -c -m
scripts.build-duration: rollup src/detect-duration.js --format cjs --output dist/detect-duration.js; rollup src/detect-duration.js --format umd --output dist/detect-duration.umd.js -n detectDuration; uglifyjs dist/detect-duration.umd.js -o dist/detect-duration.min.js -c -m
scripts.postbuild: npm run build-duration; cp package.json dist/package.json; cp README.md dist/README.md
